name: Cook the Book: Welsh Rarebit
description: Photograph from adactio on Flickr I have always intrigued by Welsh rarebit. Is it really Welsh? Why does the name sound so much like rabbit? What's a rarebit anyway? I did a little poking around, and here is what I've...
recipeIngredient: 1 pound English Farmhouse Cheddar, finely diced (about 2 cups)
6 slices white bread, such as Pullman or sandwich loaf, crusts removed, cut in half on the diagonal and toasted

recipeInstructions.text: In a double boiler, mix beer, mustard, cayenne, and Worcestershire sauce. Cook over simmering water and add cheese by the handfuls, stirring constantly to make a smooth sauce.
In a 9-inch pie plate, layer toast triangles. Pour sauce over bread and broil until cheese is bubbly, 2 to 3 minutes.
